hero.title: Fake News Detector
hero.subtitle: Verify the veracity of news using artificial intelligence
hero.inputPlaceholder: Paste or type the news you want to verify...
hero.errorEmpty: Please enter a news item to verify.
hero.errorVerify: Error verifying news. Please try again.

verifySource.title: Verify the Source
verifySource.description: Always verify the origin of the news. Reliable sources have a history of responsible journalism and are recognized for their credibility.

analyzeDate.title: Analyze the Date
analyzeDate.description: Old news can be republished as if they were recent. Always check the original publication date.

searchOtherSources.title: Search Other Sources
searchOtherSources.description: If news is true, other reliable sources will also have published it. If only one unknown source has the information, be suspicious.

identifyWarningSigns.title: Identify Warning Signs
identifyWarningSigns.description: Sensationalist headlines, excessive spelling errors, use of capital letters, and urgent sharing requests are warning signs.

verifyMedia.title: Verify Images and Videos
verifyMedia.description: Images and videos can be edited or taken out of context. Use reverse image verification tools to confirm the origin.

footer.aboutDescription: This project was developed with the mission to combat disinformation and stimulate critical thinking. It is the result of the final work in the discipline 'Algorithm, Politics and Society', taught by Professor Dr. Paulo Fonseca at the Federal University of Bahia.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our system uses Google Gemini artificial intelligence to analyze news and identify possible fake news.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Fake Lumos was born from the need to combat the growing wave of disinformation in our society. Our mission is to empower people with tools and knowledge to identify and combat fake news.
mission.description2: Through the combination of advanced technology and digital education, we seek to create a more reliable and transparent online environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: We aspire to create a more conscious and critical society regarding the information it consumes. We envision a future where every citizen has the tools and knowledge necessary to distinguish facts from fiction.
vision.description2: We want to be a reference in the fight against disinformation, contributing to a healthier and fact-based public debate.

development.title: Development Start
development.description: The project began as a final work in the discipline "Algorithm, Politics and Society" at UFBA, under the guidance of Prof. Dr. Paulo Fonseca.

ai.title: AI Development
ai.description: Implementation of text analysis algorithms and integration with fact-checking APIs to improve verification accuracy.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Making the tool available to the public, with a focus on usability and accessibility.
